About Impact Advocacy

Building bridges between dreams and reality for Latino families in DFW

Our Mission

We create spaces where dignity meets data, where cultural pride intersects with financial wisdom, and where every family's dream has a strategic path forward.

Impact Advocacy exists to bridge the gap between Latino communities and financial empowerment through culturally-sensitive education, strategic advocacy, and authentic community engagement.

Our Vision

A Dallas-Fort Worth where every Latino family has the financial literacy, resources, and advocacy support needed to build generational wealth and achieve their American dream.

"If you educate one family, you empower a generation."

Our Story

From community advocates to financial empowerment leaders

1

The Beginning: Community Recognition

Our founders recognized a critical gap in financial literacy resources specifically designed for Latino families in the DFW area. Traditional financial education often failed to address cultural nuances and language barriers.

2

Building Expertise: Media & Leadership

Through years of community leadership, media appearances on Univision and Telemundo, and partnerships with organizations like the Dallas Chamber of Commerce, our team built credibility and trust within the community.

3

Impact Advocacy Formation

In response to growing community needs, Impact Advocacy was officially formed to provide comprehensive financial literacy, strategic consulting, and community empowerment services tailored specifically for Latino families.

4

Proven Results: 500+ Families Empowered

Today, Impact Advocacy has successfully served over 500 families across Dallas, Fort Worth, Irving, Oak Cliff, and Pleasant Grove, conducting 150+ workshops and building lasting partnerships throughout the DFW area.

Meet Our Team

Experienced leaders dedicated to empowering Latino communities in DFW.

Tessie Santiago

Co-founder & President

TV personality on Univision and former Dallas Chamber President with 20+ years of community empowerment experience.

Jackie Guevara

Co-founder & Strategic Consultant

Experienced business consultant specializing in community development and sustainable growth strategies.

Emanuel Ibarra

Real Estate Specialist

DFW area real estate expert providing guidance on real estate investments and housing opportunities.

Our Values

The principles that guide everything we do

Confianza
(Trust)

Building authentic relationships based on mutual respect and cultural understanding within our community.

Respeto
(Respect)

Honoring each family's unique journey, cultural background, and individual financial goals without judgment.

Acción
(Action)

Transforming knowledge into tangible results through practical strategies and continuous community engagement.

Ready to Work Together?

Connect with our experienced team and start your journey toward financial empowerment today.
